com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener

Class PetDataListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.lib.SimpleListener
      • com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener.PetDataListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PetDataListener
extends SimpleListener
    Listens to events for configuring petblocks and UI.

        Gets called when a player joins a server. Overrides existing pets if enabled in the config.yml and spawns the petblock of the player when his pet was enabled when he left the server the last time.
